thread.title: Social Solutions Unveils New Workforce Products for States and Local Entities
thread.title_full: Social Solutions Unveils New Workforce Products for States and Local Entities

author: admin
title: Social Solutions Unveils New Workforce Products for States and Local Entities
text:
Social Solutions Global, Inc. 
BALTIMORE -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Social Solutions Global , the leading provider of cloud-based outcomes management software for workforce, education, and human services, is proud to release a number of workforce data management solutions for states and local entities. These products are aimed at facilitating data integration and program alignment across multiple program partners to manage service delivery and track performance. The product suite includes a fully functional service management and reporting system with integrated labor exchange that is Workforce Investment and Opportunity Act (WIOA) compliant, and four individualized products geared toward local workforce agencies and service providers seeking to manage a variety of common service and reporting efforts. 
ETO for Workforce with Labor Exchange is a robust workforce solution that facilitates successful employer engagement efforts, ensures successful job seeker-employer matching, and comes preconfigured to meet all federal WIOA reporting requirements. This workforce solution, built as a WIOA template, is flexible and can be easily tailored to meet unique state and local-specific program and staff needs, while being deployed quickly and efficiently. 
Social Solutions is also pleased to release its updated Workforce Initiator Suite , consisting of configurations designed to meet the needs of individual workforce programs areas to help jump start common workforce efforts. These Initiators can be selected individually or as an entire suite and include: Recruitment, Eligibility, and Intake Placement, Retention, and Advancement Employer Engagement 
Thoroughly researched, each Workforce Initiator tracks the most critical data elements, and comes bundled with powerful management and performance reports. Additional custom configuration options are also available. 
“At Social Solutions, we continually strive to be on the cutting edge when it comes to helping states meet their evolving needs for federal program requirements, and we are always thinking about innovative ways to meet the needs of all our customers, both large and small,” said Danna Nelson, SVP of Product at Social Solutions. “We believe our updated workforce product suite provides states and local entities with the flexibility to choose the product that is best suited to their needs and focus area, and in all cases, will support efficient program management and outcomes achievement.” 
Social Solutions Global , the provider of Efforts to Outcomes (ETO®) and Apricot Software™, specializes in outcomes management software for human services, workforce, and education programs. Across the globe, our software is the leader in equipping thousands of organizations with the tools needed to transform the lives of children, adults, and families by making data useful to staff at all levels, from case managers to executive leadership. 
For more information: http://www.socialsolutions.com/press-release/social-solutions-unveils-new-workforce-products-for-states-and-local-entities/ Follow us on Twitter: @SocialSolutions Connect with us on LinkedIn View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150921005852/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
